statements: DELETE FROM real_estate_properties WHERE state = 'CA' AND city = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM real_estate_properties WHERE property_id = 101 AND state = 'CA';
DELETE FROM real_estate_properties WHERE current_value > 500000 AND purchase_price < 400000;
DELETE FROM financial_reports WHERE property_id = 3 AND report_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM investment_opportunities WHERE opportunity_id IN (SELECT opportunity_id FROM investment_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01');
